text: María Cecilia Suárez de Garay (; born November 22, 1971) is a Mexican actress. She was born in Tampico, Mexico. She studied at Illinois State University. She is a Ariel Award and Emmy International nominated actress. She is known for her roles in Sexo, pudor y lágrimas, The Three Burials of Melquiades Estrada, Travesía, The Air I Breathe, Dreaming of Julia, Wash and Wear and Overboard. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Emmy Award winning actors Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:Mexican movie actors Category:Mexican television actors Category:Mexican voice actors Category:Actors from Tamaulipas
title: Cecilia Suárez
